channel.title: work on hi
channel.description: Recent content in work on hi

item.title: Making Work Visible
item.description: We grumble that there just aren’t enough hours in the day and that someone else sure seems to have a lot of free time. But we regular mortals only have twenty-four hours in a day. The problem is that we don’t protect our hours from being stolen. We allow thieves to steal time from us, day after day after day. Who are these thieves of time?
